keyword: how many calories in syrian bread
title: How Many Calories in Syrian Bread?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in Syrian bread per piece, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown for easy tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in Syrian Bread?
assumptions: Standard Syrian flatbread (pita-style), about 60 g per piece, baked plain with no added fats or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, recipe, size, flour type, and baking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One piece of Syrian bread contains about 165 kcal and 6 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one piece of Syrian bread?
faqs.a: Approximately 165 kcal for a standard 60 g piece.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Syrian bread?
faqs.a: About 33 g carbs per piece, including 2 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is Syrian bread high in protein?
faqs.a: It provides 6 g protein per piece, moderate for a bread serving.

faqs.q: How does Syrian bread compare to regular pita?
faqs.a: Similar nutrition; Syrian bread is often slightly denser but around 165 kcal per piece.

faqs.q: Does baking method affect calories in Syrian bread?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”fried versions add fat and calories; baked plain is lowest at ~165 kcal.
